title: I’ll Try Learning!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>You have beautiful hands, huh, You.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh, really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Let me see them.... Yeah, you have long fingers too, you’re probably cut out to play the piano.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>The piano!? Me!? Ahahaha, there’s no way~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>My, it’s not too late to start now, you know. I’ll teach you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Maki-chan, were you being serious....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I was. You also have good motoric skills, so you’ll probably learn quickly. The piano is a physical exercise. That kind of thing is essential. So You, why don’t you give it a try?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>No, I’m not really suited for it~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Just this once! You made me wear a uniform, didn’t you? So this time, I’ll have you listen to my request!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Well, now that you bring that up.... Alright! I’ll try learning it just this once! I’ll be in your care, Maki-sensei!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
